channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Questions to Ask After a Terrorist Attack
item.description: Confusion reigns after a terrorist attack. Initial reporting is often flawed, and misperceptions endure even after being debunked by experts. Asking the right questions can help policymakers, journalists, and the public distinguish signal from noise, avoid costly overreaction, and prepare for future threats.
